Here is a letter of resignation

[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, Zip Code]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]

[Manager's Name]
[Company Name]
[Company Address]
[City, Zip Code]

Dear [Manager's Name],

I am writing to formally resign from my position at [Company Name], effective [last working day, e.g., October 31, 2023].

This decision was not made lightly. After much contemplation, I have chosen to pursue a new direction in my career. My time at [Company Name] has been invaluable. I've had the chance to work on many challenging projects, learn from dedicated colleagues, and grow both professionally and personally.

I am deeply grateful for all the opportunities and mentorship I have received here. I have always aimed to give my best, and I am proud of what we have achieved together. I am committed to ensuring a smooth transition, and I am more than willing to help train my successor or assist in any way possible during this transitional phase.

Please accept my sincerest thanks for everything. I hope our paths cross again in the future, and I wish [Company Name] continued success.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]

===


Please do following edits:
1. replace [Manager's Name] with "Joe Biden";
2. replace [Your Name] with "David"
